name: Dark D20PFSRD
description: A dark styled theme for the Pathfinder reference, D20PFSRD that's easy on the eyes.
additional_info:
I highly recommend also installing style 116522 which was installed when this style was made.

D20PFSRD is a mess and quite difficult to make look consistent. If there are any issues or oddities, let me know the specific page.

v1.2 Few more special exceptions and fixes. Now with screenshots!
v1.1b Quick fix for the front page
v1.1 Better, more focused selectors; new format for headers; all tables should look the same now
v1.0 Initial release

discussions.name: Apparently it doesn't work at all for me
